## ItemManager class

An item manager - to fetch and manage all item data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ItemManager implements BaseManager<Item> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [BaseManager](./shieldbow.basemanager.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Item](./shieldbow.item.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(client, cacheSettings)](./shieldbow.itemmanager._constructor_.md) |  | Create a new item manager. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cache](./shieldbow.itemmanager.cache.md) |  | Collection&lt;string, [Item](./shieldbow.item.md)<!-- -->&gt; | A collection of the items cached in the memory. |
|  [client](./shieldbow.itemmanager.client.md) |  | [Client](./shieldbow.client.md) | The client this manager belongs to. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fetch(key, options)](./shieldbow.itemmanager.fetch.md) |  | Fetch an item by its 4-digit ID. The ID must be a string of 4 digits (not a number) |
|  [findByName(name)](./shieldbow.itemmanager.findbyname.md) |  | Find an item by its name. The search is case-insensitive. The special characters are NOT ignored. |
